plot: The Nation of Australia is under War in 2027 due to an Asian influx in Population. Two brothers struggle to deal with the truth of being under attack. It tests them physically and both emotionally, reflected by the pains of War.
title: Aground 2027
plot_es: The Nation of Australia is under War in 2027 due to an Asian influx in Population. Two brothers struggle to deal with the truth of being under attack. It tests them physically and both emotionally, reflected by the pains of War.
plot_en: The Nation of Australia is under War in 2027 due to an Asian influx in Population. Two brothers struggle to deal with the truth of being under attack. It tests them physically and both emotionally, reflected by the pains of War.
